AddItem.description:
DFORM [Client] 

[Panel] left
  Left-hand element to add to the DForm.

[Panel] right
  Right-hand element to add to the DForm.

Button.description:
DFORM [Client] Adds a DButton onto the DForm

[string] text
  The text on the button

[string] concmd
  The concommand to run when the button is clicked

[vararg] concmdargs
  The arguments to pass on to the concommand when the button is clicked

CheckBox.description:
DFORM [Client] Adds a DCheckBoxLabel onto the DForm

[string] label
  The label to be set next to the check box

[string] convar
  The console variable to change when this is changed

ComboBox.description:
DFORM [Client] Adds a DComboBox onto the DForm

[string] title
  Text to the left of the combo box

[string] convar
  Console variable to change when the user selects something from the dropdown.

ControlHelp.description:
DFORM [Client] 

[string] help
  The help message to be displayed.

Help.description:
DFORM [Client] 

[string] help
  The help message to be displayed

ListBox.description:
DFORM [Client] Adds a DListBox onto the DForm

[string] label
  The label to set on the DListBox

NumSlider.description:
DFORM [Client] Adds a DNumSlider onto the DForm

[string] label
  The label of the DNumSlider

[string] convar
  The console variable to change when the slider is changed

[number] min
  The minimum value of the slider

[number] max
  The maximum value of the slider

[number] decimals=nil
  The number of decimals to allow on the slider. (Optional)

NumberWang.description:
DFORM [Client] Adds a DNumberWang onto the DForm

[string] label
  The label to be placed next to the DNumberWang

[string] convar
  The console variable to change when the slider is changed

[number] min
  The minimum value of the slider

[number] max
  The maximum value of the slider

[number] decimals=nil
  The number of decimals to allow in the slider (Optional)

SetName.description:
DFORM [Client] 

[string] name
  The new header name.

TextEntry.description:
DFORM [Client] Adds a DTextEntry to a DForm

[string] label
  The label to be next to the text entry

[string] convar
  The console variable to be changed when the text entry is changed
